title: Biden on Afghanistan: "Any American who wants to come home, we will get you home"
content:
1. Biden on Afghanistan: "Any American who wants to come home, we will get you home"  CBS News
  2. Afghanistan news: Islamic State threat forces US changes to evacuations at Kabul airport  WLS-TV
  3. West struggles with Afghanistan chaos, Biden again defends withdrawal  KSL.com
  4. Opinion: The question keeps being asked: Why were we in Afghanistan?  The San Diego Union-Tribune
  5. Speak Out reader opinion: Who's to blame for the situation in Afghanistan?  Chicago Tribune
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: バイデン、アフガニスタンを語る。"家に帰りたいと思うアメリカ人は、必ず家に帰します"
拜登谈阿富汗。"任何想回家的美国人，我们都会让你回家"
拜登談阿富汗。"任何想回家的美國人，我們都會讓你回家"
